scripts.start: if [ ! -d node_modules ]; then npm install; fi && cargo build --lib --release --target wasm32-unknown-unknown && npx snowpack build && svelte-check && export RUST_LOG=debug && cargo run
scripts.watch: cargo watch -s "if [ ! -d node_modules ]; then npm install; fi && cargo build --lib --release --target wasm32-unknown-unknown && npx snowpack build && svelte-check && cargo run"
scripts.build: if [ ! -d node_modules ]; then npm install; fi && cargo build --lib --release --target wasm32-unknown-unknown && npx snowpack build && svelte-check && cargo build --release
scripts.reinstall-js-deps: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf package-lock.json && npm install
